meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Rindenau Chris Holden Lauren Drell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4480.

td.p: Jason Rindenau, a senior from Marlboro, New Jersey
Chris Holden, a senior from Carlisle, Pennsylvania
Lauren Drell, a senior from Chatsworth, California

tr.td: INVENTION
CELEBRITY NAMES
THE DRIVING TEACHER
KANSAS CITY HERE WE COME
(Alex: In honor of St. Valentine's Day tomorrow, we have...)
LOVE LINES
WELL "RED"

Chris
')

Chris
Jason

Chris

WHEN THEY WERE TEENS
